overview: Samuel has lived many lives, troubled by the past he tries hard to forget. He is sent by the crime boss, Loro, to take the souls of unsuspecting victims. In a diner, he meets a seemingly abandoned girl, Anna, and becomes fond of her, without knowing the secrets she possesses.
tagline: A fairy tale for adults with the dark beauty of a brightly-coloured Grimm's fairy tale.
title: White
